sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script is to get new native mobile "Employee Profile" cards compatible with the next experience theme. This script should be run only if the instance is on Utah or post Utah family release.</description>
        <name>Mobile Next Exp - EP</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[//Switch runManually to true in order to run this script
var runManually = false;
if (runManually) {
    var util = new sn_me.MobileNextExpUpgradeUtil();
    upgradeEmployeeProfileCard();
}

function upgradeEmployeeProfileCard() {
    var ep = [
        //Coworker List Item Config
        {
            "masterItem": "47a5c9051b3fb010322f0fe0604bcb44",
            "newCard": "8049edec07c95910264f78e99cd30031",
            "oldCard": "b2ac74891bfbb010322f0fe0604bcb4e",
            "table": "sys_sg_master_item"
        },
        //Direct Reports List Item Config	
        {
            "masterItem": "b0e209411b3fb010322f0fe0604bcb01",
            "newCard": "8049edec07c95910264f78e99cd30031",
            "oldCard": "b2ac74891bfbb010322f0fe0604bcb4e",
            "table": "sys_sg_master_item"
        },
        //Manager List Item Config	
        {
            "masterItem": "bc2f344d1bfbb010322f0fe0604bcb0c",
            "newCard": "8049edec07c95910264f78e99cd30031",
            "oldCard": "b2ac74891bfbb010322f0fe0604bcb4e",
            "table": "sys_sg_master_item"
        },
        //Selected User Profile	
        {
            "masterItem": "7c3945c8535001106d79ddeeff7b1240",
            "newCard": "ffbaec1107459910264f78e99cd300a1",
            "oldCard": "813e4100539001106d79ddeeff7b12d7",
            "table": "sys_sg_form_screen"
        }
    ];

    ep.forEach(function revertEachLink(link) {
        util.switchConnection(link.table, "view_config", link.masterItem, link.oldCard, link.newCard);
    });
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-23 16:09:05</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2f95a03c53651110fedfddeeff7b1285</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Mobile Next Exp - EP</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Employee Profile" source="sn_employee">1e95bac2738f001001b566b90ff6a7cd</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Employee Profile">1e95bac2738f001001b566b90ff6a7cd</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_2f95a03c53651110fedfddeeff7b1285</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-25 10:10:22</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
